params.interfaceID: XOR of all selectors in the contract.

returns._0: True if the contract supports the specified interface.

minimumCredit(uint128).notice: prevents reduction of available credit capacity by specifying this amount, for which withdrawals will be disallowed

name(uint128).notice: returns a human-readable name for a given market

reportedDebt(uint128).notice: returns amount of USD that the market would try to mint if everything was withdrawn

supportsInterface(bytes4).notice: Determines if the contract in question supports the specified interface.
